title: [FS9/FSX/P3D] Aerosoft/Volker Heine - FlightSim Commander v9.2.1
description:
FlightSim Commander is a professional flight planner, GPS, Moving Map and navigation tool for Flight Simulator 2004, Flight Simulator X and Prepar3D. Plan a flight professionally using entire routes or route segments. Insert North Atlantic Tracks, PACOTs and SIDÃ‚Â´s and STARÃ‚Â´s. Save or convert your flight plans in various formats such as FSX, PMDG, Radar Contact, Sqawk Box, IVAO, FSInn, Google EartÃ‚Â©, iFly, Quality Wings, LevelD or X-Plane.

New Features Version 9.2.1:

DataBase Manager 9.2.1 - -
=======================================================================

1. New DataBase Manager 9.2.1 - Now compatible with Lockheed Martin Prepar3D -

FlightSim Commander 9.2.1 - Now compatible with Lockheed Martin Prepar3D -
========================================================================
  
1. NEW

2. NEW

4. NEW
The change of color, for the design of the text in the GPS Window is possible
